content.webTitle: Rock review: Gang of Four, Songs of the Free

fields.headline: Rock review: Gang of Four, Songs of the Free
fields.bodyText: Originally released in 1982, Gang of Four's third album found them pursuing a poppier direction, albeit with their skewed rhythms and intelligent lyrics intact. It's a step down from Entertainment! and Solid Gold, but 'I Love a Man in Uniform' gives an idea of what the Human League might have sounded like had they been strident pacifists.
